General.Name: Ral Yatirim Holding AS
General.Description: Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. operates as a construction and contracting company in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Bisas Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S and changed its name to Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. in March 2018. Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.
